title: Remember Me
description: "Remember Me glimpses into the life of one teenaged girl as she struggles with friendship and love while under the shadow of her fatherÂ´s death. Tessie Peterson and her mother are left together, and each woman has her own path towards recovery. After abandoning her friendships from an early age, Tessie begins to realize that she wants people back in her life. Only through courage and revelation does Tessie finally understanding the meaning of true love."
author: Nadia Ajdari
